segments.text: I notice the boy’s determination as he reaches into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s so focused, and I can’t help but admire his boldness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I glance at the puddle creeping toward where he stands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to shout a warning, but part of me wants to see how it unfolds.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That innocence in the girl’s eyes as she waits is captivating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost like they’re characters in a play, unaware of the stakes involved.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel torn between laughter and concern as I watch them.
segments.speaker: PAR
